title: Date and nut loaf cake
ingredients: ['180g dates, stones removed and chopped', '250ml water', '125g butter', '100g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '200g plain flour', '1 egg, beaten', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '120g chopped walnuts', 'Sauce', '55g butter', '80ml double cream', '110g dark brown soft sugar']
